Verses: 1 purajaadhigalukku Virodhamaai Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisikku Undaana Karththarudaiya Vasanam:

2 egipthaikkuriththum, Aippiraaththu Nadhiyandaiyil Karkemisile Irundhadhum Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar, Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeem Ennum Yoodhaa Raajaavin Naalaam Varushaththile Muriya Adiththadhumaana Paarvon Neko Ennappatta Egipthu Raajaavin Raanuvaththaikkuriththum Avar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal:
3 kedagangalaiyum Parisaigalaiyum Aayaththampanni, Yuththaththukku Vaarungal.
4 kudhiraiveerare, Kudhiraigalin Mel Senangalai Vaiththu Eri, Thalaichcheeraayai Anindhukondu Nillungal; Eettigalaith Thulakki, Kavasangalaith Thariththukkollungal.

5 avargal Kalangi, Pinvaangugiradhai Naan Kaangiradhenna? Sutrilumundaana Bayangaraththinimiththam Avargaludaiya Paraakkiramasaaligal Muriyundu, Thirumbippaaraamal Ottamaai Odippogiraargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
6 vegamaai Odugiravan Odippogavendaam; Paraakkiramasaali Thappippogavendaam; Vadakke Aippiraaththu Nadhiyandaiyile Avargal Idarivizhuvaargal.
7 pravaagampol Puranduvarugira Ivan Yaar? Alaigal Modhiyadikkira Nadhigalpol Ezhumbivarugira Ivan Yaar?

8 egipthiyane Pravaagaththaip Pol Puranduvarugiraan, Avane Alaigal Modhiyadikkira Nadhigalpola Ezhumbivarugiraan; Naan Poi, Dhesaththai Moodi, Nagaraththaiyum Adhil Kudiyirukkiravargalaiyum Azhippen Endraan.

9 kudhiraigale, Poi Erungal; Radhangale, Kadakada Endru Odungal; Paraakkiramasaaligalum, Kedagam Pidikkira Eththiyoppiyarum, Pooththiyarum, Villaippidiththu Naanetrugira Leedhiyarum Purappadakkadavargal.

10 aanaalum, Idhu Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavarin Naalum, Avar Thammudaiya Saththurukkalukku Needhiyai Sarikkattugira Naalumaayirukkiradhu; Aagaiyaal, Pattayam Patchiththu, Avargaludaiya Raththaththaal Thirupthiyaagi Veriththirukkum; Vadadhesaththil Aippiraaththu Nadhiyandaiyile Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavarukku Oru Yaagamum Undu.
11 egipthin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Kannigaiye, Nee Keeleyaaththukkup Poi, Pisin Thailam Vaangu; Thiralaana Avizhdhangalai Nee Koottugiradhu Virudhaa, Unakku Aarokkiyamundaagaadhu.
12 jaadhigal Un Lachchaiyaik Kelvippattaargal; Un Kookkuralaal Dhesam Niraindhadhu; Paraakkiramasaaliyinmel Paraakkiramasaali Idari, Iruvarum Egamaai Vizhundhaargal Endraar.
13 egipthudhesaththai Azhikka Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadh Nechchaar Varuvaanenbadhaikkuriththu, Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyinidaththil Karththar Sonna Vasanam:
14 aayaththappattu Nil, Pattayam Unnai Sutrilum Undaanadhaip Patchiththupodugiradhendru Solli, Egipthile Ariviththu, Mikdholile Koori, Noppilum Thakpaanesilum Prasiththampannungal.
15 un Veerar Vaarikkollappadugiradhenna? Karththar Avargalaith Thallinadhaal Avargal Nilainirkavillai.

16 anegarai Idarappannugiraar; Avanavan Thanakkaduththavanmel Vizhugiraan; Avargal: Ezhundhirungal, Kollugira Pattayaththukkuth Thappa Namadhu Janaththandaikkum, Naam Pirandha Dhesaththukkum Thirumbippovom Engiraargal.
17 egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvon Paazhaakkappattaan; Avanukkuk Kuriththa Kaalam Mudindhadhendru Ange Saththamittu Sollugiraargal.
18 parvadhangalil Thaaborum Samuththiraththin Aruge Karmelum Irukkira Nichchayampol Avan Varuvaanendru Senaigalin Karththar Ennum Naamamulla Raajaa Thammudaiya Jeevanaik Kondu Sollugiraar.
19 egipthudhesavaasiyaagiya Kumaaraththiye, Siraiyiruppukkup Pogum Prayaana Saamaangalai Aayaththappaduththu, Nop Paazhaagum; Adhu Kudiyillaamal Sutterikkappattuk Kidakkum.
20 egipthu Magaa Nerththiyaana Kadaari, Adikkiravan Vadakkeyirundhu Varugiraan.

21 adhin Naduvil Irukkira Adhin Koolippadaigal Kozhuththa Kaalaigal Polirukkiraargal; Ivargalum Nirkaamal, Thirumbikkondu Egamaai Odippovaargal; Avargal Visaarikkappadugira Avargaludaiya Aabaththunaal Avargal Mel Vandhadhu.
22 avan Paambaipola Seerivaruvaan, Raanuvabalaththode Nadandhu, Kaaduvettigalaippol Kodarigalodu Adhinmel Varuvaargal.
23 ennappadaadha Marangalaayirundhaalum Andhak Kaattai Vettuvaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avargal Vettukkiligalaip Paarkkilum Adhigamaanavargal, Avargalukkuth Thogaiyillai.
24 egipthin Kumaaraththi Kalanguvaal; Vadathisai Janaththin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappaduvaal.

25 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Idho, Naan No Ennum Pattanaththilulla Thiralaana Janangalaiyum, Paarvonaiyum, Egipthaiyum, Adhin Dhevargalaiyum, Adhin Raajaakkalaiyum, Paarvonaiyum, Avanai Nambiyirukkiravargalaiyum Visaariththu,

26 avargal Praananai Vaangath Thedugiravargalin Kaiyilum, Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarin Kaiyilum, Avanudaiya Sevagarin Kaiyilum, Avargalai Oppukkoduppen; Adharkuppinbu Adhu Poorvakaalaththil Irundhadhupol Kudiyetrappadum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

27 en Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobe, Nee Bayappadaadhe; Isravele, Nee Kalangaadhe; Idho, Naan Unnai Dhooraththilum, Un Sandhadhiyai Avargal Siraiyiruppin Dhesaththilumirundhu Viduviththu Ratchippen; Appozhudhu Yaakkobu Thirumbivandhu, Amaidhiyodum Saangobaangaththodum Iruppaan; Avanaith Thaththalikkappannuvaar Illai.

28 en Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobe, Nee Bayappadaadhe Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Unnudane Irukkiren; Unnaith Thuraththivitta Ellaa Jaadhigalaiyum Naan Nirmoolamaakkuven; Unnaiyo Naan Nirmoolamaakkaamal, Unnai Mattaai Dhandippen; Aanaalum Unnai Naan Kutramillaamal Neengalaaga Viduvadhillaiyengiraar.
